source: Ce que vous devez savoir sur le CORONAVIRUS ou COVID-19
translated: Kɨ́ ɓɨɠəsɛ́ kɨyíi mɨ́ fɨlwœ́ fɨ́ lə́ kolónavilʉ́s (KOVID-19)
Ntáŋzeéŋ wɨ́ ɓúŋ ɓə́ Kaməlún mɨ́súwɨ́ lɨɠάsɨ ɗɨ́ jyɛ Beŋ

source: SUMMARY
translated: Mətwœ́ mə́ jyɛ mɨ́ mə́lɨ́ mɨ́ káata anə́

source: - Coronavirus  - Vulnerable people - Symptoms - Transmission of coronavirus - How to protect yourself - What to do in case of contamination? - Definition of some difficult words
translated: -Kolónavilʉ́s                                    -Ɓúŋ ɓə́ kɛɛ ɗeéʼ                  -Láléeŋ nə́ fɨlwœ́ fɨ fə́əlɨ́seŋ -Láléeŋ nə́ fɨlwœ́ fɨ́ fə́əshyáleŋ -Láléeŋ nə́ múŋ alɨ lə́ aɗə́ fɨlwœ́ fɨ́ -Láléeŋ nə́ múŋ alɨ́ lə́ akɨ ɗɨɨ́ fɨlwœ́ fɨ́ fɨ́shyá má nyɨ́ -Lɨfasɨ ɗɨ́ míí mɨ́ mə́ɗéekí lɨwóʼ

source: Coronavirus
Elderly person
Person with a heart condition or disease
Vulnerable people People of all ages can become infected with this new virus. The elderly and people with pre-existing conditions (such as asthma
Fever Fatigue
Dry cough Muscle aches and pains
Symptoms The symptoms of a coronavirus infection are similar to those of the flu: fever
Person with a cough
Transmission of coronavirus COVID-19 is transmitted by people carrying the virus. When a sick person coughs or sneezes
translated: they expel droplets through their nose or mouth. If a person breathes in these droplets

source: How to protect yourself
translated: Láléeŋ nə́ múŋ alɨ lə́ aɗə́ fɨlwœ́ fɨ́

source: 1. Avoid touching eyes
2. Wash your hands frequently with soap and running water. Then dry them with a clean towel.
translated: 2. Wɨsɨ́ ɓyααʼ ɓɔ́ lə́ shɨ́shœ́ camiŋ kɨ cœŋ mɨ́ mənɨ́ mɨ́ məə́gαα

source: 3. Cough and sneeze into the crook of your arm.
4. Avoid eating raw meat and touching live animals.
5. Keep at least one meter away from a person who is cou- ghing or sneezing.
translated: 5. Kuúkwə́ lɨkɛ́ŋ lɨ múŋ anə́ áakwə́sɨ

source: 6. Avoid shaking hands. Greet each other with a nod or a verbal greeting.
7. Avoid gatherings.
8. Restrict movement.
9. Keep informed and verify the source of information.
translated: 9. Ɓɨlyáŋ məlée lə́ ɓɨ́wóo ɓɨɓɛ́ŋ ɓɨ ɓəətóleŋ mɨ́ fɨlwœ́ fɨ́

source: What to do in case of contamination? If you have symptoms: - Avoid contact with other people. - Stay at home. - Call 1510 and follow the doctor's instructions. Other possible numbers:
translated: Láléeŋ nə́ múŋ alɨ́ lə́ akɨ ɗɨɨ́ fɨlwœ́ fɨ́ fɨ́shyá má nyɨ́ Á wɨɠyɛ́ lə́ wɨtɨ́ lɨ fɨlwœ́ fiŋ: - Wɨɗə́ ɓúŋ ɓə́mbóo. - Wɨlwə́ mɨ niá. - Wɨɓɨ́lα 1510 mɨ́ nɗɨ́ wɨ́ ɓɔɔ́ŋ

source: To date
translated: there is no cure for COVID-19

source: Definition of some difficult words  Asthma: chronic lung disorder Contamination: infection Diabetes: disease that occurs when the body can't use glucose normally Flu: cough
